REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2135 reute d f BC-ADAGE-<ADGE>-SETS-NEW 03-23 0051

TEXT.TITLE: ADAGE <ADGE> SETS NEW WORKSTATION PRODUCT
TEXT.BODY:
Adage Inc said it introduced a new family of workstations compatible with International Business Machines Corp's <IBM> 5080 Model 2 graphics. The company said prices for the Series 6000-II workstations start at about 20,030 dlrs.
Reuter
